Name: Daily Ganapati Puja
description: Simple daily worship of Lord Ganesha
significance: Removes obstacles and brings auspicious beginnings
steps_summary: Sankalpam > Achamanam > Ganapati Dhyanam > Shodashopachara > Arati
materials_needed: Ganapati idol; flowers; incense; lamp; prasadam

Name: Vishnu Morning Prayer
steps_summary: Sankalpam > Achamanam > Vishnu Stotram > Tulasi Pradakshina > Arati
materials_needed: Vishnu image; tulasi plant; flowers; lamp

Name: Lakshmi Friday Puja
steps_summary: Kalasha Sthapana > Lakshmi Dhyanam > Shodashopachara > Lakshmi Ashtakam > Arati

Name: Shiva Abhishekam
description: Sacred bath ceremony for Shiva Lingam
steps_summary: Rudra Dhyanam > Abhishekam > Bilva Archana > Rudram Chanting > Arati
materials_needed: Shiva lingam; milk; honey; water; bilva leaves

Name: Durga Navami
steps_summary: Kalasha Puja > Durga Dhyanam > Navagraha Puja > Durga Saptashati > Kumari Puja
materials_needed: Durga image; red cloth; flowers; fruits; sweets

Name: Satyanarayana Vratam
steps_summary: Sankalpam > Kalasha Puja > Satyanarayana Katha > Prasadam Distribution
materials_needed: Banana leaves; rice; jaggery; fruits; story book
